parameters.name: author
parameters.description: the author of the news item

parameters.name: created after
parameters.description: restricts search results to only items created after this datetime

parameters.name: created before
parameters.description: restricts search results to only items created before this datetime

parameters.name: minimum points
parameters.description: restricts search results to only items with more points than this amount

parameters.name: maximum points
parameters.description: restricts search results to only items with fewer points than this amount

parameters.name: minimum comments
parameters.description: restricts search results to only items with more comments than this amount

parameters.name: maximum comments
parameters.description: restricts search results to only items with fewer comments than this amount
